Why is cancellation blocked for digital key already exposed? Keys accessed are considered delivered. Refund eligibility depends on license terms—contact support for potential goodwill resolution.
Can I adjust exchange shipping speed? If not yet dispatched open exchange details and select new speed; any differential cost charges or credits at modification time.
How do I ensure recurring invoices attach PO automatically? Add PO pattern to 'PO Automation Rules'. System appends generated PO reference each cycle based on rule logic.
Why does tracking show 'Consolidation Hub' event? Packages aggregated for route optimization; hub event doesn't imply delay unless accompanied by 'Extended Processing' notice.
Can I pay outstanding balance with mixed methods? Partial wallet credit then single card for remainder supported. Multiple cards beyond one not supported in single transaction.
How do I track return inspection stages? RMA timeline shows Received, In Inspection, Decision Made, Refund Initiated. Hover each stage for timestamps and any notes.
Why is cancellation fee applied? Certain services incur non-refundable setup or fulfillment handling charges. Fee discloses pre-confirmation and appears only when within locked processing window.
Can I request invoice with additional cost center code? Add 'Cost Center' under extended metadata and regenerate. Code assists internal allocation; no financial impact.
How do I convert a wallet refund to external payout? External payout only if regulatory withdrawal option enabled. Submit 'Withdrawal Request'—processing times vary by region.
Why does my payment show duplicated authorization? Some issuers create shadow authorizations for card-on-file validation. Only one will capture; duplicates fall off automatically.
Can I reorder a previous configuration quickly? Use 'Reorder Configuration'—system loads prior bundle selections for review before adding to cart.
How do I request a paper invoice mail-out? Enable 'Postal Invoice'. We print within 2 business days; delivery times depend on postal region. Digital copy remains available online.
Why is return denied as 'Condition Unsuitable'? Item missing components, shows excessive wear, or violates hygiene standards. Decision note outlines unmet criteria for transparency.
Can I request alternate refund method mid-process? If refund not initiated you can switch to wallet or original card. After initiation method locked by network workflow.
How do I track subscription shipment backlog? Dashboard shows backlog count, projected catch-up date, and any inventory constraints causing delay.
Why does invoice show 'Pending Currency Reconciliation'? Multi-currency capture awaiting final FX rate. Once confirmed, invoice converts and locks rate for records.
Can I cancel a scheduled manual capture? If capture not executed open payment details and click 'Cancel Manual Capture'; authorization remains until expiry or new capture event.
How do I request faster refund for exchange rejection? If replacement fails allocation choose 'Fast Refund'—wallet credit issues instantly; card refunds follow standard network timing.
Why is tracking stuck at 'Departure Scan'? Package awaiting next network trailer; not necessarily lost. Delay beyond SLA triggers automatic investigation ticket.
Can I request partial exchange (only color change)? Select 'Variant Exchange'—system reserves new color; size and other attributes remain unchanged for efficiency.
How do I track a consolidated multi-vendor order? Consolidated tracking shows aggregate status plus per-vendor sub-panels with individual carrier links and ETA adjustments.
Why does cancellation not remove loyalty points instantly? Points issued may remain pending until final capture reversal posts; system adjusts ledger after cancellation fully completes.
Can I request audit log of invoice edits? Business accounts can download 'Invoice Audit Log' listing field changes, timestamps, and user IDs for compliance tracking.
How do I escalate a prolonged payment review hold? If hold exceeds SLA use 'Escalate Review'. Case moves to senior analyst; you may be asked for additional verification documents.
How do I request a cancellation grace extension? If near end of standard window open 'Request Extension'—approval depends on fulfillment status and item customization stage.
Can I cancel recurring add-on only for next cycle? Use 'Skip Add-On Next Cycle'—add-on resumes following cycle unless removed permanently.
Why is digital subscription cancellation delayed? We queue cancellation until license server revokes entitlements. Delay usually under an hour; billing stops immediately.
How do I modify scheduled exchange ship date? Open exchange details and pick a new date within allowed range; stock reallocation occurs automatically.
Can I request compliance audit of a high-value return? Submit 'Return Audit Request'; we verify chain-of-custody scans, serial integrity, and condition documentation for regulatory assurance.
Why is invoice credit memo pending after refund? We batch memo generation to align with refund settlement. It posts once payment network confirms funds movement.
How do I cancel a manual renewal I triggered prematurely? If new cycle invoice unpaid click 'Void Renewal'. Original cycle remains until its expiration date.
Can I request invoice with HS codes for shipped items? Under 'Export Documentation' enable HS codes—reissue includes each item's classification for customs declarations.
Why is cancellation blocked by compliance hold? Order flagged for regulatory review (e.g., restricted export). Cancellation allowed only after release to prevent bypassing checks.
How do I expedite a return inspection? Select 'Priority Inspection' if available; high-value or time-sensitive items move to fast lane. Not guaranteed if hazardous or serialized.
Can I change cancellation reason after submitting? Yes—while status is 'Pending' open request and edit reason. After finalization reason locked for audit consistency.
Why does my refund show 'Gateway Accepted' but no funds yet? Payment gateway approved the refund API call; issuer settlement still pending. Funds post per network timing.
How do I request batch cancellation of multiple pending orders? Use 'Bulk Cancel'—select eligible orders and confirm. Each generates individual cancellation record for traceability.
Can I merge two exchange requests? If both replacements not allocated yet choose 'Merge Exchanges'; items consolidate into one shipment and original requests mark merged.
Why is invoice voiding unavailable? Invoices with partial refunds, applied credit memos, or regulatory locks cannot be voided. Issue corrective memo instead.
How do I cancel a return pickup request? Open RMA and click 'Cancel Pickup'. If driver already assigned cancellation may not prevent attempt—refuse pickup politely.
Can I request pre-clearance for international return? Provide customs details before dispatch; we generate simplified return invoice reducing border processing time.
Why is subscription cancellation offering downgrade suggestion? System detects usage pattern indicating partial feature need—downgrade preserves data continuity without full termination.
How do I request invoice with dual currency presentation? Enable 'Dual Currency'—invoice lists original totals plus converted amounts at capture FX rate.
Can I cancel a partially consumed service bundle? Remaining unused units convert to prorated credit if bundle terms allow. Activated units remain billable.
How do I request anonymized invoice copy? Use 'Anonymize Personal Data'—removes name and email, retaining city and country for compliance.
Why is cancellation blocked after allocation freeze? Inventory reserved for synchronized launch event; changes disabled until event passes. You may return after delivery.
Can I request refund statement for insurance claim? Download 'Refund Statement'—lists refund ID, method, date, and item breakdown with condition codes.
How do I dispute subscription cancellation fee? Open 'Cancellation Fee Dispute' citing reason (non-delivery, feature issue). Approved disputes credit fee before finalization.
Why is refund showing 'Intermediary Settlement'? Cross-border refunds may route via intermediary acquirer; extra hop adds 1–2 processing days.
Can I cancel an exchange after replacement ships? Once shipped exchange converts to standard return path if original item arrives. Decline replacement if unwanted and request refund.
How do I retrieve archived invoices? Under 'Archive' search by invoice ID or date range; restore moves copy to active list without altering historical metadata.
Why is cancellation pending wallet credit reversal? We must re-register loyalty or wallet credits used on the order before finishing cancellation to ensure ledger accuracy.
Can I request refund to different card? Networks require original source card. If card closed issuer usually reroutes funds; contact issuer for retrieval from closed account.
How do I cancel a scheduled downgrade? If downgrade pending open subscription changes and click 'Cancel Scheduled Downgrade'. Original tier continues.
Why is exchange allocation delayed? High demand or low stock requires staged allocation. System reattempts periodically; consider alternate variant if urgent.
Can I request early cancellation of a future subscription change? Yes—remove pending change; subscription reverts to current settings without interim proration.
How do I print multi-language return instructions? Choose languages needed then download consolidated PDF containing each translation section for the same RMA.
Why is invoice number skipping a sequence? Voided or test invoices reserve numbers. Skipped IDs remain in ledger history but not active billing list.
Can I request cancellation confirmation certificate? Download 'Cancellation Certificate' listing order, timestamp, and user ID—useful for compliance or audit.
How do I dispute an exchange downgrade credit? Submit 'Credit Dispute'—we validate calculation (prorated difference vs original price) and adjust if formula error occurred.
Why is refund ledger showing pending reconciliation? Multiple simultaneous refunds require ledger grouping; final ledger update occurs after batch settlement.
Can I cancel a subscription pause? If pause not active yet click 'Cancel Pause'. Active pauses can be resumed early with 'Resume Now'.
How do I request specialized packaging certificate? For laboratory or sterile goods download packaging certificate showing tamper-evident seal verification and lot tracking.
Why is cancellation creating two refund entries? Order used split capture across shipments; each capture reverses individually producing distinct refund lines.
Can I request invoice with additional regulatory statement? Add statement in 'Compliance Notes' then regenerate; appears under footer section.
How do I convert exchange to store credit mid-process? If replacement not allocated choose 'Convert to Credit'. RMA shifts to refund path producing wallet credit memo.
Why is refund amount adjusted for loyalty points redemption? Points reduced effective cash portion; refund covers monetary payment plus any restored point value as separate ledger entry.
Can I schedule cancellation at next renewal rather than immediate? Use 'Cancel at Renewal'—benefits continue until end of cycle then terminate automatically.
How do I request invoice split by department cost center? Use 'Split Invoice' selecting item-to-cost-center mapping. System generates multiple segment invoices referencing original.
Why is cancellation credit delayed for wallet usage? Wallet credit reversal ensures accurate reapplication; once ledger updates cancellation finalizes with restored wallet balance.
Can I dispute a cancellation denial? Submit 'Cancellation Denial Dispute' citing reason and supporting evidence (e.g., missed SLA cause). Reviewed by escalation team.
How do I request multi-factor verification before high-value cancellation? Enable 'High-Value Protection'—system requires second factor (SMS or app) for cancellation confirmation.
Why is refund appearing as pending adjustment after partial cancellation? We recalculate tax and promotional allocations; final refund posts once redistribution completes.
Can I request real-time cancellation status updates? Enable push notifications or webhook (business accounts) to receive status transitions: Requested, Pending, Finalized, Refunded.
How do I change default refund destination? In 'Refund Preferences' select 'Wallet First' or 'Original Method'. System applies preference unless regulatory constraints override.
Why is cancellation blocked for compliance restricted item? Export-controlled or age-restricted goods require trackable disposition; cancellation short-circuits controls so only return is allowed.
Can I request invoice with line-level cost codes? Enable 'Line Cost Codes' and assign codes per item before generating invoice; useful for project accounting.
How do I escalate a stalled refund? If refund exceeds published window open 'Escalate Refund'; we query gateway logs and issuer status, then provide resolution ETA.
Why is cancellation not reversible? Once inventory release and refund initiation occur reversal risks stock inconsistencies. Place new order instead.
Can I request consolidated refund statement for a period? Business accounts can export 'Refund Summary' listing refund totals, memos, and reversal cases per month.
How do I cancel an item pending personalization? If personalization not started cancellation possible; once engraving/print underway only return under defect policy.
Why is invoice locked after audit log export? To preserve integrity post-audit, further edits restricted. Generate credit memo for additional changes.
Can I request refund notification via SMS? Enable 'Refund SMS Alerts'—you'll receive messages at initiation and settlement stages.
How do I re-open a cancellation case? If status is 'Finalized' re-opening not supported; file a new support ticket citing prior case ID for context.
Why is refund split into multiple settlement dates? Each capture from split shipments refunds on its own timeline; network posting can vary by issuer batch cycles.
Can I cancel subscription effective at future date? Use 'Cancel Effective On' selecting date within allowed window; usage continues until chosen date then terminates.
How do I retrieve combined cancellation and refund report? Business dashboard 'Cancellation & Refund Report' exports merged dataset including reasons and amounts.
Why is invoice missing tax ID field? Tax ID not provided at checkout and jurisdiction prohibits retro insertion. Future invoices include it once added to profile.
Can I request cancellation before first subscription shipment only? Yes—if first shipment not packed cancel without proration or fees. After packing normal policy applies.
How do I escalate invoice error impacting accounting close? Flag 'Critical' in error report; we prioritize correction document issuance before close deadline.
Why is refund blocked pending chargeback investigation? Card issuer opened dispute; refund paused to avoid duplication. Outcome determines reversal or release.
Can I cancel one item in multi-license digital bundle? Individual license cancellation allowed if bundle terms permit disaggregation; otherwise full bundle must cancel.
How do I request invoice with masked buyer name? Use 'Mask Buyer Name'—invoice shows initials only; full name retained in internal ledger.
Why is cancellation queue lengthened? High-volume event or maintenance backlog. Queue displays estimated processing time; urgent cases can request escalation.
Can I schedule refund issuance date? Not for card refunds; wallet refunds can be deferred by using 'Delay Wallet Credit' up to 3 days for ledger alignment.
How do I cancel subscription upgrade before activation? If activation date in future click 'Cancel Pending Upgrade'; no proration or fee applies.
Why is refund ledger showing negative adjustment then correction? Temporary placeholder adjusted during multi-currency conversion; final correction line balances rounding.
Can I batch download cancellation certificates? Yes—select range under 'Certificates Export'; ZIP contains PDFs named by cancellation ID.
How do I request invoice with internal project code? Add 'Project Code' metadata then regenerate. Code aids cross-team cost tracking.
Why is cancellation blocked for promotional giveaway item? Giveaway items have zero monetary value but inventory tracking; cancellation disabled—decline shipment or ignore.
Can I request manual verification of defective item before refund? Upload video or diagnostic logs; manual verification speeds refund for complex technical products.
How do I cancel partially consumed credits package? Remaining unused credits convert to wallet at prorated rate per package terms; consumed credits non-refundable.
Why is refund delayed due to anti-abuse review? High frequency of returns triggered review to ensure policy compliance. Approved cases proceed; future automation restored.
Can I request invoice with expanded usage metrics? Subscription invoices can include usage breakdown (requests, seats) by enabling 'Usage Metrics'.
How do I cancel scheduled invoice generation? If invoice pending click 'Cancel Generation'; order remains active; next cycle generates as normal.
Why is refund showing 'Issuer Rejected' then 'Retry Scheduled'? Issuer temporarily refused settlement; system queues automatic retry. If repeat failure, contact issuer.
Can I request invoice eliminating zero-value lines? Toggle 'Hide Zero Lines'—invoice omits promotional or complimentary items while retaining total context.
How do I cancel a partially returned order remainder? Select remaining shipped lines and initiate cancellation if unfulfilled; delivered lines must follow return process.
Why is refund split with manual adjustment line? Manual adjustment covers promo recalculation or ex-gratia credit; main refund line reflects item value reversal.
Can I request re-cancellation after mistaken reactivation? If subscription reactivated accidentally you may re-cancel immediately; original cancellation fee logic re-applies if window passed.
How do I obtain refund exchange rate details? Multi-currency refunds include 'FX Details' link listing original amount, rate, and converted refund value.
Why is invoice missing discount line? Discount applied as line-level net pricing rather than separate line. Expand item to see discount component breakdown.
Can I cancel digital add-on feature mid-cycle? Feature remains until end of cycle unless 'Immediate Deactivation' selected, in which case no refund of remaining days.
How do I request consolidated refund memo for bulk returns? Use 'Consolidate Memos' after multiple approvals; aggregator memo references individual RMA IDs.
Why is cancellation window shorter for limited release? Scarcity management reduces cancellation time to preserve allocation fairness. Window displayed pre-confirmation.
Can I request invoice with consolidated tax by region only? Enable 'Region Aggregated Tax'—jurisdiction details hidden; regional totals summed for simpler review.
How do I cancel wallet top-up? If top-up pending settlement you may void; settled top-ups convert to spendable balance and cannot be canceled—withdrawal policy applies.
Why is refund flagged 'High Risk Pattern'? Rapid sequential returns or mismatch purchase vs use claims trigger pattern detection review before funds release.
Can I request invoice with bundle components expanded? Toggle 'Expand Bundles'—each bundle item lists its individual price allocation for transparency.
How do I cancel scheduled credit memo issuance? If memo pending due to correction workflow click 'Cancel Memo'—underlying invoice remains unchanged.
Why is refund showing adjustment after FX fluctuation? For dynamic FX refunds we apply spot rate at initiation; adjustment line corrects if capture vs refund timing mismatch.
Can I cancel a scheduled consolidated billing run? If run is pending click 'Cancel Consolidation'; individual invoices remain separate—no grouping applied.
How do I request invoice with subscription usage forecast? Enable 'Include Forecast'—adds projected next-cycle usage table based on current trend.
Why is refund missing for one item in multi-line cancellation? That line may have shipped and requires return path; only unshipped lines refunded immediately at cancellation.
How do I dispute a chargeback I believe is fraudulent? Open 'Chargeback Center' and upload proof (tracking, delivery confirmation, customer communications). Timely evidence improves reversal odds.
Can I get real-time carrier temperature telemetry? For eligible cold-chain shipments enable 'Live Telemetry'—dashboard updates sensor readings every 15 minutes until delivery.
Why is invoice tax reconciliation delayed? Multi-jurisdiction orders require final address normalization and rate verification. Automated reconciliation occurs within 24 hours.
How do I request partial chargeback resolution settlement? If issuer offers partial credit recovery accept via 'Settlement Offer'—remaining disputed amount recorded as write-off.
Can I track oversized freight with geofencing alerts? Enable 'Freight Geofence'—receive notifications when shipment enters or exits defined regional boundaries.
Why did refund method fallback to wallet? Original card closed or network declined settlement path; policy allows wallet fallback for faster resolution—withdrawal rules apply if needed.
How do I request dynamic currency invoice display? Enable 'Dynamic FX'—invoice fetch uses near-real-time mid-market rates with timestamp; financial ledger still stores base currency.
Can I pre-authorize a card for multiple upcoming shipments? Use 'Multi-Capture Authorization'—single hold covers projected subtotal; unused authorization portion releases after final capture window.
Why is delivery requiring specialized liftgate service? Freight item exceeds manual handling weight. Liftgate fee appears pre-confirmation; refusal may delay final delivery scheduling.
How do I request accelerated chargeback evidence submission? Mark case 'Priority' and upload all documents in one bundle (POD, item photos, customer chats) to expedite analyst review.
Can I obtain invoice with carbon offset line items? Enable 'Show Offset Line'—invoice lists emission estimate and corresponding offset credit purchase as separate line.
Why did partial refund exclude discount portion? Discount allocated across all items; refund returns proportional value of the specific item’s share rather than full discount amount.
How do I request customs duty breakdown per item? Enable 'Item Duty Breakdown' in export settings—invoice reissue lists duty rate, base, and amount per HS code.
Can I view payment risk score? Business accounts can enable 'Risk Indicators'—authorization detail shows score range (low/medium/high) with contributing factors (velocity, mismatch).
Why is oversized return requiring scheduled pickup? Dimensional weight or restricted handling forbids drop-off. Scheduling ensures proper equipment and chain-of-custody scan.
How do I request refund to virtual card? Virtual cards process like standard cards; ensure original authorization used virtual card. We cannot redirect from physical to virtual card post-capture.
Can I pause multi-package consolidation? Disable 'Consolidate Shipments'—future items ship individually for speed, potentially increasing shipping cost visibility.
Why is chargeback status 'Representment Filed'? We submitted evidence challenging dispute. Card network reviews; outcome updates to Won or Lost when finalized.
How do I request invoice with COI (Certificate of Insurance) reference? Add insurance reference metadata; reissued invoice lists COI number under compliance section.
Can I auto-refund failed final-mile delivery? Enable 'Auto Refund Non-Delivered'—if carrier marks final failure without resolution refund initiates after internal review window.
Why is payment flagged '3DS Authentication Required'? Issuer mandates strong customer authentication. Complete challenge to finish authorization and prevent soft decline.
How do I request invoice normalized to fiscal quarter? Use 'Quarter Normalization'—invoice lists quarter code and groups lines by quarter segments for multi-period services.
Can I dispute carrier dimensional weight surcharge? Provide actual measured dimensions and scale proof; approved disputes credit surcharge difference.
Why is refund posting in two currencies? Original multi-currency capture produced secondary conversion; each portion posts—base currency plus converted component for clarity.
How do I request advanced shipment notice (ASN)? Enable ASN—system emails packing details (weights, contents, estimated load time) prior to carrier pickup.
Can I prioritize chargeback cases by value? Sort 'Chargeback Center' by disputed amount; mark high-value cases Priority to allocate investigation resources first.
Why is invoice showing 'Usage Pending' lines? Metered service usage data awaiting final aggregation; line updates once provider reports finalized counts.
How do I request split freight delivery schedule? Use 'Split Schedule' for multi-pallet orders—select which pallets deliver earlier; remaining pallets hold until chosen date.
Can I escalate a stuck 3DS challenge? If challenge frame fails to load use fallback SMS OTP or open support to re-initiate authentication.
Why is refund net of restocking credit? High-demand items incur restocking fee; line item shows fee deduction and net refund amount after fee application.
How do I request invoice with harmonized discount reporting? Enable 'Discount Harmonization'—group disparate promo types under unified summary section.
Can I subscribe to chargeback webhook events? Business accounts can register webhook URL to receive events: Created, Evidence Due, Represented, Closed.
Why is delivery requiring appointment confirmation? Freight or oversized shipments need receiver availability—confirm slot to avoid reschedule fees.
How do I request invoice omitting internal usage metrics? Toggle 'Hide Internal Metrics'—invoice remains financial-only for external sharing.
Can I dispute a restocking fee? Provide photos and reason (unopened, immediate return). Approved disputes refund fee portion separately.
Why is chargeback evidence request repeated? Initial submission incomplete or unreadable; re-upload required to meet card network formatting standards.
How do I request invoice with aggregated bundle tax? Enable 'Aggregate Bundle Tax'—bundled items show single tax line instead of per-component tax lines.
Can I set threshold to auto-escalate chargebacks? Configure 'Auto Escalate > value'—cases exceeding amount flag for priority workflow automatically.
Why is refund ledger showing partial settlement first? Multi-instrument payments settle sequentially; first instrument posts then remaining follow.
How do I request freight insurance certificate post-delivery? Under shipment details click 'Insurance Certificate'—document lists insured value and policy number.
Can I dispute chargeback lost outcome? File 'Second Presentment' where network rules permit—requires stronger documentation (customer signature, device records).
Why is invoice missing shipment weight data? Weight not captured for digital or service line items; only physical items record dimension and weight metadata.
How do I request consolidated chargeback performance report? Download 'Chargeback KPIs'—win rate, average dispute value, evidence submission timeliness metrics.
Can I automate refund evidence collection? Enable 'Auto Evidence'—system stores delivery proof, tracking scans, and communication logs for instant dispute responses.
Why is return refusal generating partial refund only? Some items are consumable or non-returnable; refusal triggers refund for returnable items while others remain final sale.
How do I request invoice with chronological event timeline? Enable 'Invoice Timeline'—lists order placement, fulfillment, shipment, adjustments, and payment events.
Can I dispute dimensional weight appeal rejection? Provide carrier escalation reference and additional measurement evidence; second appeal considered case-by-case.
Why is refund blocked by AML review? Large or unusual refund patterns trigger Anti-Money Laundering screening; funds release once checks complete.
How do I request invoice showing prepaid service allocation? Enable 'Prepaid Allocation'—invoice lists remaining balance and consumed portion for prepaid packages.
Can I preemptively add evidence for potential disputes? Upload 'Proactive Evidence' (delivery photos, ID verification) stored for future dispute retrieval.
Why is chargeback win still showing pending adjustment? Network settlement cycle not closed yet; internal ledger updates post-cycle to reflect recovered funds.
How do I request invoice with surcharge separation? Enable 'Separate Surcharges'—breaks out handling, eco, and payment surcharges individually.
Can I dispute automated fraud cancellation? Submit 'Fraud Cancellation Dispute' with identity verification and purchase intent explanation. Successful disputes restore order if stock remains.
Why is return inspection requiring data wipe confirmation? Smart devices must have personal data removed to protect privacy before final disposition.
How do I request invoice with hierarchical category grouping? Enable 'Category Hierarchy'—groups line items under parent categories for analytics alignment.
Can I auto-cancel unaccepted subscription upgrade offers? Enable 'Auto Expire Offers'—unaccepted upgrade proposals cancel after configured days.
Why is refund method locked after partial settlement? Once any portion posts network restricts method changes to maintain transaction integrity.
How do I request invoice with serialized item list? Enable 'Show Serials'—each serialized product line expands to display its unique serial numbers.
Can I dispute cancellation window start time? Provide evidence of order placement timestamp discrepancy; approved corrections adjust cancellation eligibility.
Why is chargeback evidence auto-submitted? 'Auto Evidence' enabled; system compiled standard documents. You can append additional files before network deadline.
How do I request invoice with packing slip merge? Enable 'Invoice + Packing Slip'—single PDF contains financial and item packaging details.
Can I escalate AML refund hold? Provide identity verification and transaction context; escalation review prioritizes legitimate customer refunds.
Why is cancellation confirmation email delayed? High event volume or queued notification service. Status in portal authoritative even if email lags.
How do I request invoice with embedded QR for quick re-order? Enable 'Reorder QR'—each line includes code linking to product page for reorder convenience.
Can I dispute partial chargeback lost portion? Not typically—network final decisions on partial settlements are binding unless new evidence emerges under allowed schemes.
Why is refund flagged for manual compliance review? Large cross-border amount or regulated category triggers documentation validation before release.
How do I request invoice excluding promotional item descriptions? Enable 'Mask Promo Descriptions'—shows generic 'Promotional Item' text while retaining quantity and value.
Can I auto-cancel unpaid invoices after grace period? Enable 'Auto Void Unpaid'—invoices void if unpaid beyond defined grace days; associated orders may cancel unless partially fulfilled.
Why is chargeback case marked 'Information Requested'? Network seeks more detail (fulfillment logs, usage metrics). Provide promptly to avoid default loss.
How do I request invoice with adjustable line sequencing? Enable 'Custom Sequence' and drag lines to preferred order before finalizing regenerate.
Can I dispute cancellation fee for operational outage? Provide outage incident reference; approved cases waive fee due to service disruption.
Why is refund flagged 'Duplicate Claim'? System detected overlapping refund for same item. We consolidate or reject duplicate to avoid double credit.
How do I request invoice with extended warranty line? Enable 'Show Warranty'—adds warranty purchase details including term and coverage start date.
Can I set auto-escalation for stalled cancellations? Configure 'Cancellation SLA Escalation' threshold—cases exceeding timeframe route to priority queue.
Why is chargeback win not refunding loyalty points? Points issued originally remain; dispute win recovers funds only. Adjustments to points occur if initial issuance tied to lost value segment.
How do I request invoice showing internal cost allocation percentages? Enable 'Cost Allocation %'—each line lists percentage contribution to total spend.
Can I dispute fraud cancellation after KYC verification? Provide KYC completion reference; if verified mismatch false positive we reinstate order if inventory available.
Why is refund segregated into principal and fee components? Refund returns item value; separate component reverses previously charged service or processing fee.
How do I request invoice excluding serial numbers for privacy? Toggle 'Hide Serials'—serials removed from external copy while internal ledger retains them.
Can I automate cancellation reports weekly? Enable 'Scheduled Cancellation Report' selecting weekly cadence; secure link emailed upon generation.
Why is chargeback case closing with partial recovery? Network arbitration awarded only subset of disputed amount. Remaining portion remains lost revenue.
How do I request invoice with fulfillment center codes? Enable 'Fulfillment Codes'—each physical item line lists its origin center identifier.
Can I dispute restocking fee retroactively? Provide unopened proof and timely return documentation; approved retro dispute credits fee via memo.
Why is refund allocation different across multi-currency items? Each item refunded at its original capture currency and FX rate; aggregated statement shows combined converted summary.
How do I request invoice with multi-tier tax footnotes? Enable 'Tax Footnotes'—footnotes list jurisdiction code explanations and exemption references.
Can I auto-cancel dormant unpaid orders? Enable 'Dormant Order Cancellation' with inactivity threshold; system cancels and releases stock automatically.
Why is chargeback evidence rejected for format? Unsupported file type or size exceeded limit. Re-upload standard PDF/JPEG within allowed size.
How do I request invoice integrating sustainability score? Enable 'Sustainability Score'—score algorithm summarizes packaging footprint and offset effectiveness.
Can I dispute cancellation queue ordering? Queue prioritization based on timestamp and risk classification; only high-risk fraud reviews reorder. Standard cancellations non-disputable.
Why is refund showing 'Escrow Release Pending'? Marketplace escrow holds funds until delivery confirmation; release triggers refund disbursement path.
How do I request invoice with dynamic notes per line? Enable 'Line Notes'—add contextual notes per item (maintenance schedule, internal ref) before generation.
Can I auto-cancel failed 3DS orders? Enable 'Auto Cancel Failed Auth'—soft declines re-attempt; hard authentication failures cancel to protect against fraud.
Why is chargeback case flagged 'High Fraud Risk'? Transaction matched known fraud patterns (device fingerprint, velocity). Additional evidence recommended (identity verification).
How do I request invoice excluding tax for VAT-exempt entity? Add validated VAT exemption certificate; reissued invoice omits VAT lines per jurisdiction rules.
Can I dispute AML hold outcome? Provide additional proof of transaction legitimacy (business purpose letter); secondary review may release refund.
Why is cancellation blocked for escrow marketplace order? Funds held until escrow conditions met; cancellation could break contractual obligations. Request escrow mediation instead.
How do I request invoice with SKU alias mapping? Enable 'SKU Alias'—each line shows internal code plus public-friendly alias for external sharing.
Can I auto-refund undeliverable cold-chain shipments? Enable 'Cold-Chain Auto Refund'—if temperature excursion or failed delivery occurs refund initiates post-verification.
Why is chargeback showing 'Arbitration Pending'? Network escalated beyond representment; final decision may incur fees. Provide any last supplemental evidence promptly.
How do I request invoice with machine-readable JSON export? Click 'Download JSON'—includes structured fields for integration (line items, tax details, adjustments, currency, FX rate).
